website_summaries.verdict: Its deep bass, waterproof design, and eye-catching LED lighting makes this a great model for parties.
cons: Voice control would be a nice feature for the price

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Charge 3
customer_reviews.text: The JBL Charge 4 has one giant flaw that frankly makes all other positives about it basically irrelevant to me. It's a mono speaker. Meaning other than the two bass woofers on the sides, there's only one speaker built in. It's not even in the center. Do yourself a favor and buy the Charge 3. It has stereo speakers instead of this mono garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Mars Jackson

customer_reviews.title: JBL could make the Charger4 better BUT nop they dont
customer_reviews.text: Too bad JBL lower the sound quality on the charger 4 adding only 1 speaker to give a Sadly MONO sound unlike the charger 3 that have 2 speakers and to make it worst dont even bring a wall charger Hope JBL make a better job on the charger 5
customer_reviews.author: Doel R.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great and has plenty of colume
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a JBL Flip 2 for the past couple of years so I felt confident in the brand. The JBP Charge 4 is fantastic. It has a good, solid, durable feeling in the hand and the sound quality is great. The volume is fantastic. On my bike I run it at like 4 out of 10 and it's blasting. If you're looking for a studio speaker this isn't it, but if you're looking for something to take out on your bike, or on a picnic, or out in the woods, or in the workshop then this is it. It's a fantastic speaker and well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zack J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound!  We'll see how long it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality. Great sound! Does not automatically reconnect when you walk out of range and then back into range. Battery indicator only shows you charge level when you first turn it on. After that, pause, play, or change tracks to display the battery level. Sound profile automatically changes when you exceed a certain volume. Most people won't notice. But I'm sure it does this to protect itself. Bass is plentiful. The rest of the audio range can be tuned by your music app. First impressions are great. We'll see how long it lasts. JBL app requires GPS location. They are data mining. Don't use the JBL app!
customer_reviews.author: Thor Hang

customer_reviews.title: Good product but no speakerphone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last week. The speaker sound quality & volume is good & I was happy with the purchase. I bought this after seeing on JBL website that the speaker has speakerphone support. Plz note this speaker DOES NOT have speakerphone feature. The information on JBL website is wrong. I chatted with their tech support & they confirmed that they will remove this description from their website.
customer_reviews.author: Chanaveer

customer_reviews.title: Probably Fake
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t come with the serial number sticker on the back neither on the box, probably fake do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker despite not being true stereo
customer_reviews.text: The big debate about this speaker not being stereo like the Charge 3 is really a mute point when the speakers on the charge 3 are only a few inches away from each other anyway. Not enough stereo separation to make ANY difference in real world listening environments, in my opinion. I found the sound quality and loudness of the C4 to be very impressive for such a small Package and would not use the fact that it only has one main speaker in front affect your buying decision at all ! Great little speaker and long battery life....just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Rick H

customer_reviews.title: The BIG REASON to choose over Megoboom 3
customer_reviews.text: New Megaboom has no AUX input Might not be a big deal to other but occasionally I like to use an Aux cable to connect to a speaker. 1. Wired sound is better than Bluetooth 2. Battery lasts longer in both Speaker and source if BT off/not used 3. Not all sources have BT or have fiddly BT connection. Just my two cents.. I see pro reviewers not mention the missing AUX on Mega 3
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Bob

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing! I totally loved it, I’m still trying to connect it with a charge 3 I own too, but for some reason it doesn’t work. I don’t like the fact the charger just comes with a usb cable
customer_reviews.author: cindy duarte

customer_reviews.title: Definitely doesnt worth the price
customer_reviews.text: there is an unacceptable audio latency when you connect it via bluetooth. I tried my v4.1 bluetooth notebook, samsung mobile phone and ipad. the only way you can use its bluetooth function is while you are listening music from spotify so you wont recognize. Audio delay solved with using aux cable but then it started cutting the sound for 1 sec randomly which is very annoying. Firmware was also up to date and couldnt find the reason. I will be returning it tomorrow. JBL support center gave useless advices. Please be aware guys dont buy this poor qulity product.
customer_reviews.author: Cihan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality at Moderate Levels
customer_reviews.text: In spite of all the rave reviews, I’ve found the Charge 4 to be especially lacking in sound quality at moderate to low volume levels. At high volume levels ( enough to damage hearing over time) the audio quality is fairly good for a small speaker, although quite artificial. So, if your looking for a loud, party speaker, not a bad choice. If you care about audio quality at moderate listening levels this would be a bad choice. Packing it up for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Bodhi's friend

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Had it a month and it will not charge and I can’t refubd it cause it’s been 30 days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good volume with good bass but vocals and mid range sound fake
customer_reviews.text: good volume with good bass but vocals and mid range sound fake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes with only the cord, not a full charger.
customer_reviews.text: Very excited for the speaker. I bought it to have on a weekend camping trip, but I didn't realize it was going to come without a full charger! Left me unable to charge it as my other charger doesn't disconnect into a block and a cord, it stays as one. I now have to buy wall block in order to charge this speaker I already spend a lot of money on. Seems like a real cheap way to save money as company.
customer_reviews.author: Anneliese King

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, wife can hear if from a difference floow.  =P
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, for me. Great sounds and portability. It's main function is being used as the main speaker for my computer. Whether streaming movies or music. With the latter, I am able to carry the unit throughout the house if need be. The best sound I've obtained from it is when it is back against a solid wall, or in a corner. I do have one annoyance when changing volume levels. On occasion the step "up" or "down" is too great. Making the audio TOO LOUD for the room, or too soft. It needs an in between option, imo. The above occurrence normally happens when using a cell phone versus the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McCrary

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED NEGATIVE REVIEW!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Only 7 months after purchase it no longer powers on. I contacted the seller who refused to do anything. DO NOT purchase this unit from that seller! Really rich sound with deep bass. Very easy to set up and pair to the Amazon Echo Dot. Very pleased with this and with Amazon's pricing, availability and shipping speed! Amazon Prime rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Mike44NH

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Listen to the reviews saying it’s not as good as the 3 cause I didn’t and I regret it, go with the 3 it’s overall better.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and incredible battery life so far. I use it in my delivery vehicle and 50% volume is more than enough. Great bass for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Dweezel

customer_reviews.title: Cannot take calls..no voice assist support.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this speaker for the all around Sound quality from bass on up to middle, then highs. Purchased 2nd speaker exact same model next time I could afford to and use them for music and stereo surround sound from my television L and R mode great for tv sound! JBL has always had a great reputation and this new product will continue those highest quality standards I’ve always experienced in using JBL Speakers. Only Down fall is no longer supports call speaker or voice assistance like Alexa or google atm.
customer_reviews.author: TometBomb

customer_reviews.title: Does not turn on!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, just received it. Charged it, I didn't leave it plugged in after charging. When i tried it the next day it gliched on and turn off. Does not turn on now. I've read some other reviews, and this is apparently happening alot with JBL products coming from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tony2Toes

customer_reviews.title: Big Bang for the Buck!!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good quality sound for the size. Bass — yeah! Links to up to 100 similar units - this I want to see. Can fill a couple of rooms with a good level of solid sound - no problem. Easy to find on sale making it a class leader imho!!
customer_reviews.author: Mingaa

customer_reviews.title: Good sound in a compact package
customer_reviews.text: I was going to spend $150 and 10 hours of my time installing a new stereo and speakers in my boat, but figured this would be easier and wouldn't be wasted in the 99% of the time when I'm not on the boat. Not as much volume though.
customer_reviews.author: Benn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for portable music around pool and park
customer_reviews.text: The kids use this all the time. I bought the 3 for me last summer, but they use it far more. Got a second one (4) this year so there is always an extra around. They take it from pool to porch to room to park and repeat. Plenty loud for those around it or around pool. Clear sound at volume and provides full sound even with higher bass music. A lot of bang for the form factor. Practical use is mulitdays-week on a charge so doesn't always need charging and doesn't strand you. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: A Scheifele

customer_reviews.title: I want to know why when you plug it into charge
customer_reviews.text: why there's no lights or showing if it's charged or not have to turn it on to see the lights to see if it's charge do you have to do that all the time turn it on to see if it's charged or can you just plug it in and the lights will show if it's when it's going to be fully chargeYou have to turn it on to see the lights to see if it's charge do you have to do that all the time turn it on to see if it's charged or can you just plug it in and the lights will show maybe something wrong with mine please let me know
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I never looked into JBL before this. Sound quality is amazing. Durability is top notch. It is sleek and not to bulky. I have not tested out the waterproof part but I think leave that for another time. The battery lasts a very long time, like it says 20+hrs. It's also a great backup portable charger for my phone. I kinda wish I got the bigger one just because I really liked this brand. This is me saying this not someone telling me to say it, but if you like protecting your things I would also get the carrying case. I will upload a picture at another time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: the best bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker. I was choosing between the JBL charge 3 and this one and I’m very much glad I chose this one. The bass is amazing and the sound quality is very loud. Not even 50% volume and it can fill up a small room already 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the size.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase. I pared with another Charge 4 to get stereo. Great sound. The bass could be deeper but it still is acceptable. Two issues are there is no user manual and no wall charger. So to pair two speakers I had to rely on YouTube to set it up. I also had to contact them to get wall charger specs. I'm using one that has a 5Volt/2Amp output. I play the speakers at a medium/loud volume. At best the battery is fairly depleted after 8 to 10 hours. It would be great if they offered a sub woofer.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Plato

customer_reviews.title: Such good sound for such a small device.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Bluetooth speaker for 7 years and it finally died, so I needed to find a replacement. After careful research and debate I decided on this model. It looks slightly small, but it packs a punch. I used it the first weekend after arrival at a campsite. The site was booming with music and I was astonished at the quality. The speaker also lasted 2 full days of almost constant use. Definitely my new camping speaker. Added bonus is you can charge phones via the speaker. Overall love the quality of this device. My only gripe is it could be a little bassier.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Had a bad one
customer_reviews.text: I had different models was time for new one since going out town. Ship was fast but the thing would not stay connected to any phone for music or call. Sent back and had to go purchase from store and pay little more. But no issues and sounds great. Sent back got refund for broken one. Understand that’s not seller fault they can’t test new equipment and not all will function out box correctly. So for the hassle gave 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: walter freeland

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Mobile Music Speaker Ever !!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mobile music device, can take it Every Where, for the size it can Sound super Loud !!! (But it didn't come with a adapter, I would have paid the extra money,) I still use my old extra iPhone adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Won’t
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed which is odd because I’ve owned a few JBL products and they have been nothing shy of amazing. I have 2 JBL 3rd generation now that have far better sounds quality than the 4th gen. It won’t stay connected to blue tooth when the 3’s never have that problem. There is a feature with JBL that allows you to hook up to 100 JBLs together. Guess who’s won’t stay connected? Mine!!!! It’s so annoying and I put in a return for the item but got very sick and now can’t return it at all. In my opinion it’s a waste of money. You are better off get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not thrilled with this. I returned a Bose BT speaker in exchange for this one. I bought this because I am having hearing issues but sound quality seems a bit “muddy” and fuzzy and didn’t realize until now that the sound is mono. Also the Bluetooth feature seems unstable in my room where I keep the WiFi modem and several other bt electronics. After some research I discovered this speaker won’t function with too much WiFi and bt interference. A bit frustrating. I’m probably going to return. It works well in every room in the house except the room where I need it the most. Tired of playing games every night to get Bluetooth to work.
customer_reviews.author: JambiJ

customer_reviews.title: What the hell, JBL?
customer_reviews.text: The Charge 4 is largely as advertised; it's rugged, pretty, and has great volume and battery life. I'm sure the stereo feature is really cool too. HoWEvER! This listing doesn't give the full story. The Charge 4, following the series' trend, has a limited bass frequency, only going as low as 60 Hz. Unlike other models, the 4 wildly overamps the 80-200 Hz range, making full-range songs sound hollow and voices seem to warble. EQ is required to get a passably balanced sound. It sounds better underwater. You may think I'm joking, but I'm not. Substantially richer and fuller.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Coleman

customer_reviews.title: No longer working after 30 some days...
customer_reviews.text: One star....not 4. So my product return time just ended Feb 9th. The start button just stopped working on the 13th. This speaker is no longer working. It is not wear and tear because I used maybe 5 times. It is charged. I have no idea what to do.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: This will  not connect to other JBL speakers!!
customer_reviews.text: Cool little speaker, but JBL straight up lies when they say it connects to your other JBL speakers. They advertise that it connects to up to 100 other JBL speakers, but it isn’t true. I have another JBL, which is why I purchased this one. It 100% DOES NOT connect to my other JBL speaker. I called customer service and they confirm that it will not connect to my other JBL speaker. It is a complete bait and switch. Poor, customer service and straight up lies on the part of JBL.
customer_reviews.author: tlauerii

customer_reviews.title: Not a stereo speaker!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, not even stereo!!! The cheaper flip had significantly better sound quality. Please don’t waste your time or money get the flip instead
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bass sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice work done on these speakers! The sound is rich and beautiful. The bass function is amazing! It last long. The battery charge indicator is perfect and very useful. These speakes las very long on a single charge. The only thing is a little uncomfortable is the portability. It's big and heavy and no handles - you will have to buy a carrying case separately. It's too big for easy portability. But overall I am very satisfied with this device. I am buying two next time, I gave this one to granma. Next time i will buy two to pair up. It's worthy! Very amazing sound!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Dolluxe

customer_reviews.title: Compact speaker pack a wall up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a similar JBL speaker system for our oldest daughter for Christmas a few years ago and she has raved about hers ever since. She new that I loved music and when she realized that I was interested in this type of a system she urged me to purchase a JBL. In fact, she recommended that I purchase the model a step up from hers. I am thrilled and amazed at the sound this speaker can coax out of my phone! Instead of spending really big bucks on a sound system I spent use over a hundred dollars and I now own a portable music system that sounds like a million bucks! The Lord is good to me!
customer_reviews.author: Wefarm2

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, if you dive too deep into YouTube reviews regarding decibel comparisons etc. etc. you'll never end up buying any speaker... Keeping it simple; I can tell you this is an awesome portable speaker for it's price range. I take it to the community pool, BBQ's, outdoor family events and it's perfect! Long lasting battery, good bluetooth connectivity and packs a pretty good punch in both volume and bass. I would maybe consider the larger JBL Xtreme 2 if it goes on sale, but in all honesty this Charge 4 is perfect for what I use it for. Portability to me is more important that a little higher volume and bass. Love the speaker! Well done JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Love JBL!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second JBL speaker. I had the jbl flip for several years, but the charging port pins broke. I chose this one because it has the new usb c charging port. This is definitely larger than the jbl, but still manageable. Sound quality is great! We use it in our fenced in backyard and it projects really well. The waterproof detail is nice too so you can use it outdoors without worry.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is my second JBL Bluetooth speaker. I also have the Charge 2+ which I am very happy with, however, after 3 years, the battery no longer holds a charge. The Charge 4 has excellent sound quality at the high, mid and low ranges. I bought both the Charge4 and UE Megaboom 3 for comparison purposes. No contest... JBL was the superior speaker for sound in my opinion. The UE speaker wins for features as it comes with a great App that allows for a more customized sound and user experience. Sound quality is what I care about most so I kept the JBL and returned the UE.
customer_reviews.author: FCD

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker-Way over priced by this Vendor
customer_reviews.text: I love the speaker and have one already. In this case I had to get one for a friend with AMZN for a specific reason, but the price charged $179 is grossly over priced. I could have gotten one at Walmart for $130 all day long, but had to use AMZN for a friend. Why does AMZN allow this level of gouging? Other wise, perfect speaker for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: This thing JAMS
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my son's birthday and it has been a great speaker. He uses it with his friends all the time on the back of his truck and we have used several times around the pool. The speaker is plenty loud enough to hear over the equipment and it has great bass response for such a small package the battery seems to stay charged forever and we have not had one single issue with Bluetooth connectivity. I also like the fact that you compare this with other speakers to have a true surroundsound when you're out with your buddies or at a party.
customer_reviews.author: Felice Navidad

customer_reviews.title: Decent speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works good enough for me. Unlike most I bought this because it was a directional speaker. I use it while welding in the shop and don't want everyone to have to listen to my music too. It stays 20-30' away from me and I can hear my music just fine. The battery will last all day (even at high volume) unless you try to charge your phone with it. I got 4hrs with my phone plugged in for half that time. Without using it to charge my phone, I got 10hrs out of it and it was only down one "dot" out of 5. Overall the sound is decent. Worth the money if you get it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: The cord for re-charging does not work and the warranty people know nothing about it
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. However, the cord supplied for re-charging the battery does not work. When I called the extended warranty people they were no help. When I called Amazon for authorization to return the speaker, my reasoning for speaker was challenged. Ultimately I returned the speaker, went to Best Buy and bought the same speaker and got help with a new cord for re-charging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's just a good product
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple this is a good quality, loud and portable Bluetooth speaker. I think if you want to get the job done the jbl line is it. In the year I've had it I've inspired a few friends to get their own after hearing and enjoying it. I don't fuss with eq or other features because this is my portable "party" speaker and out the box it's tuned just fine for that. If you want the best sound quality with stereo and more settings you should will probably need to spend more than what this is to get notable improvement.
customer_reviews.author: rockee712

customer_reviews.title: I Love This Thing
customer_reviews.text: I had intended on buying a MegaBoom, but I got to test out this speaker along with a Boom and a MegaBoom, and the fullness of sound (in particular the quality of the bass) on this thing blew those two out of the water. The non-universal charge cord is a little annoying, but oh well. Don't expect to get Sub Bass out of this thing. It would have to be about 5 inches taller for that.
customer_reviews.author: Murve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this, I had a JBL flip for a few years before it finally died. I decided to go for this charge rather than another flip since I wanted a little more volume out in the garage. This Charge has surpassed my expectations. It’s significantly louder than the flip, but never loses clarity even at high volumes. The audio is clean, and bass is very good as well. The biggest surprise has been the battery life. I feel like the speaker gets used constantly, but it only needs to be recharged once a week or so. It’s also waterproof, which makes it super easy to clean. All in all I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin van den Aarssen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: First off I would like to say I love this speaker. It's sounds amazing for the price. And battery life is very good..sit has a 1 year warranty to which I had to use on my first one and have no complaints. The battery quit charging so I looked up the warranty and email them had no problems getting it replaced. So my gripe is with the battery longevity life. I use mine everyday where I work and I'm getting about 3 years out of this product. But what do I know I'm not a battery expert. So for the price of this ..you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: steven w.

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Very skeptical at the beginning. Did Lots of research on competitors. Let's be honest--this is not going to replace a total sound system (if that's what you are dreaming of), but this speaker goes from room to room (and outside) and gives sound that is of high enough quality for you not to feel like you are missing out on something better. I bought this for a family member first, saw how good it was, then bought one for myself within the same week. Battery life is great. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Apollinaire

customer_reviews.title: Could sound better, but good enough.
customer_reviews.text: As far as portable BT speakers go, it does the job. Music comes out, sounds pretty clear, and is loud enough for a small outdoor area. I keep 2 of these by the pool (1 on each side) and link them together with stereo sound. Good way to have music in the pool area without having to wire speakers and such. I'm thinking about getting 2 more in order to cover more area,but these will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Blunt-JJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: After having the JBL Flip 4 for several years and loving it, I decided to upgrade and purchase the JBL Charge 4. I bought it new and once it came in tested it out. However, the sound quality was extremely distorted and sounded like the speaker was already blown because the bass was so scratchy even at 25% volume. I am not sure if this is an issue with the JBL Charge 4 or the individual speaker I received. Either way I will be returning this product and am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Better deals around black friday
customer_reviews.text: My wife complains about how it charges, sometimes it doesn't get a full charge. That might have more to do with how she goes about it though. One concern to be aware of though is how the watertight flap can pinch the charging connection. She puts another USB cable into the out port to keep the flap off of the USB C in
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Where's The Speaker On The Front Left Side?
customer_reviews.text: Hello! This speaker, the JBL Charge 4, still gives me the great, deep punchy bass that I've grown to love,and is very loud, BUT, there's only one forward facing speaker on the right side? How mono of them! I can't get over this!, even for cosmetic purposes! It connects well with Bluetooth, as well as with my Xtreme 2, and Flip 4 speakers! At 50 percent volume, I've received approximately 18 hours of playtime! Good battery! Unlike the Charge 3, you can NOT use Charge 4, to talk on your phone!, or Google, Siri, etc!, as JBL omitted the microphone! If you already have the Charge 3, there is ABSOLUTELY no reason, to buy the Charge 4!
customer_reviews.author: RicGillis

customer_reviews.title: Absurd Battery
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a year. Just took it to the beach for a second time. Got it wet. Got sand on it. Works perfectly. It can bump as well but the mids aren't super clear if you care about that. My guess is most of you dont, but I do, so I took off a star. All together, this is a 5 star device and if you want to annoy your roommate or put it in a backpack and ride downtown with the volume all the way up you totally can and your phone will probably die first. unless you rode the bike. 5/5 would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this thing on the go for a few months now, and it's a great speaker. I purchased it to replace my stolen Charge 3. The quality is very good for most genres, and the bass is something to appreciate. The battery life is outstanding. Sometimes I forget to turn it off (I disabled the power sounds for it and it's easier to forget now) and it will last days of just being on. It's very portable as long as you have a decent-sized bag to carry it in. I used my backpack. Very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Muddy sound, bad sound effects
customer_reviews.text: I returned the JBL Charge 4 for two reason. First, to my ears the sound has too much bottom. Music sounds muddy and the higher end is lost due to too much bass. Unfortunately, there's no way to adjust the bass and treble. What you hear is what you're stuck with. The second reason for my return is the awful electronic sound effects that play automatically when you turn the device on or off. Regardless of your streaming volume these sound effects are loud (and completely unnecessary).
customer_reviews.author: William C. Geoghegan

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the bass and sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's very worth the prime day sale price and nearly worth retail selling price. Sound quality is very nice, and can hear low frequency bass very well. Very easy to connect to and doubles as a power bank if you need to charge your phone. Have not tested the water resistance, but many others have, i'd look up videos testing it. Recommend this over other speakers in its price range, but definitely get a case for it.
customer_reviews.author: Wenlesh

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying little cheap speakers that weren't worth the money, didn't last very long and had terrible sound. So, I decided to spend a lot more for a quality speaker. I got this for use by the pool. It linked very easily to my phone. The sound is great with plenty of bass. I can use it for several hours a few days in a row without worrying about the battery running down. It seems to charge back up fairly fast too. So glad I spent the money on this, totally pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is the best ever! I had the smaller version of this speaker prior and the battery life was basically nonexistent even with a full charge so I needed to upgrade. I decided to go with this speaker and I'm so happy I did. The batter life lasts FOREVER. I literarily never charge it, or very rarely do, and have yet to have it die on me. The sound quality is outstanding, it gets super loud without compromising quality AND you can even charge your phone with it. Amazing speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Coles

customer_reviews.title: Flip 4 and Charge 4 together to create an apartment-wide sound system
customer_reviews.text: We have the JBL Flip 4 and the Charge 4 that are able to sync together and provide coverage over the whole apartment, so that we can listen to the same thing in the kitchen, in the study, in the living room, in the bathroom or on the deck. Syncing is easy and intuitive, volume control on the secondary speakers is controlled individually, and you can "pause" them without interrupting anyone else's listening. Or, we can individually Bluetooth to a speaker, and listen to different things. Or, we use the speakers to amplify laptop sounds. These are perfect, simple to use, and easy to understand. We are so happy with them!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband had the prior version and we loved it so much so that I purchased this with the case to link to his. We use them everywhere and a lot!!! Charge life is excellent - even better than my husband's. Individual and linked stereo sound fantastic. Portability at the beach, by the pool and around the property when we're doing projects and chores great and convenient. Ease of use for a technical illiterate such as myself ranks A+. So, after an entire summer of almost daily use, I'm giving this a solid 5.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Battered by sound from the left and the right now...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to complement my first such speaker. Got it during the Black Friday craziness at almost $100 off the original price. Yay! This is not a stereo speaker, but I use my smartphone to bump sound from both for the stereo experience. I keep these in my kitchen where I can listen to my music whilst doing most chores, though I have to keep the volume down so as not to disturb the neighbors. I would purchase again. Maybe I will get a third speaker and listen to my music in trereo!
customer_reviews.author: seabrass

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst jbl product I've owned, Mono, directional sound makes sure you hate it.
customer_reviews.text: This has less sound outputand quality than a JBL flip 2! I'm extremely disappointed with this model. It's mono and if the JBL logo isn't pointing in your exact direction you don't get much sound. Don't even bother with the hassle of trying this, I did it for you...
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jay

customer_reviews.title: Fine speaker, but bluetooth issues
customer_reviews.text: When I could get it working, I really liked the speaker itself. But the bluetooth experience was infuriating. It would pair pretty easily, but Windows would show it in a disconnected state. I got it working several times, but I don't know what I did. I played around in Device Manager, tried updating drivers, tweaked every audio setting I could find. I gave up this last time when Windows showed the speaker in my playback devices, but in a "disconnected" state. When I right-clicked and selected Connect, nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Oneil

customer_reviews.title: Amaizing sound, can connect 100 of devices in a chain
customer_reviews.text: You can't imagine how powerful these speakers can be! Very nice deep bass and good quality in all ranges. You can upgrade firmware and do very basic configuration via JBL Connect mobile app. JBL is a leader as always. A bit pricey though so only for sound enthusiasts only. You can create a mesh of JBL Connect devices and cover all property with the nice deep sound
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, feel and color of this speaker. It was very easy to connect to my phone and I've been quite impressed with the sound quality. Even more impressive is the battery life of this speaker. I can go days to weeks without charging depending on how much I play music. Like that you can charge your phone off of it too!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne L

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I own at top-of-the-line Bose Bluetooth speaker. A friend needed a recommendation but the Bose was twice the price of the JBL. I imagined the JBL would sound good. It's JBL after all. I delivered the JBL Charge 4 to my friend last night and we were BLOWN AWAY!!! Fabulous sound. Beautiful design. Excellent user interface. WONDERFUL that it's recharged from a standard USB power supply. I'm completely happy that it doesn't come with one. Who doesn't have extras? This JBL product is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Roberts P Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, price changes not good
customer_reviews.text: I lobe this speaker and truly lobe the sound and plan on getting another to complete a stereo sound. No it does NOT gibe you stereo but sounds good. What I don’t like is the bee changing prices on the same item done by Amazon. Bought it a lot cheaper than it is right now.
customer_reviews.author: Lt. Bear

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t pair with flip 5 party boost feature. So you can’t connect this with new jbl speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I found out that these don’t pair with JBL FLIP 5’s “power boost” feature, which is an infinity symbol 8 instead of the x shaped symbol of the connect +. This was highly annoying, as it’s the only reason I got this. I returned it for another flip 5, which I found out to be just as loud and bass IMO. Just get the flip 5 instead of this (it fits easily in car cup holders and easier to bring around with the loop and weight/ size).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Cauthen

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a compact package
customer_reviews.text: This wireless speaker has great sound. Maybe too great. Purchased for my husband as it was a wish list item for him. Reverberation of rocking resonance that is 80’s era classic rock can now be heard/felt at any given time. Good when you wanna be rockin, not so good when your littles need to be restin. I’m sure my neighbors are enjoying the impromptu concerts.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W

customer_reviews.title: Your money is begging you to buy this.
customer_reviews.text: If you want quality sound to blast while you dance on your own while cleaning the kitchen, or working on a super dope motorcycle in the garage, or while you roast s’mores up the canyon around a toasty bonfire while celebrating the joys of lasting friendships, BUY THIS SPEAKER. It’s small enough to toss in a backpack and big enough to pack an audio superpunch. The battery life is AMAZING and I can go days without charging it. Bluetooth connection is great and you can pair it to multiple devices which is a HUGE win for JBL. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kait Urmston

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. I take it everywhere. Its plenty loud both inside or outside. I take it fishing, to parties, camping, kayaking, job sites, cookouts, etc. Its battery life is excellent. I dropped this thing off my kayak and it sank in 2 feet of water for probably 30 seconds and I lifted it out and it was still playing music. Love that you can pair multiple JBL speakers together for even more power. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Engle

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. The sound is so crystal clear we were in disbelief the first time we used it. We love taking it to the beach and my fiance always takes it golfing with his friends. The only thing I would change is to make it lighter. It is somewhat heavy and bulky. I wish it was thinner and lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Portable Sound
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about purchasing a portable speaker as I'm typically underwhelmed with the sound quality, but this I dig. Out of the box it was lacking a little, but after EQing with my phone it is punchy and exactly what I am looking for. Large enough to carry the tech needed to produce quality sound, small enough to carry around or even throw in my bicycle bag to listen while riding. Not much I can complain about here. If I save up the cash I might buy a second one to get stereo sound, but I haven't honestly missed it that much. Buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Landis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided to buy a portable speaker and I'm not disappointed with my decision. First time playing impressed me. Update: after using the speaker for some time, it's not the best. Would I recommend? Depends on the purpose. The BT range is pretty incredible. It gets the job done for being portable. Like others stated, it's mono with the two woofers. Battery seems to drain on me a little quicker so I make sure I keep it charged after or during use.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: should be a lil cheaper
customer_reviews.text: if it werent for the battery life and ability to charge other devices, I would give this a 3-3.5. bass response and loudness is ok, definitely not bad. its better indoors than outdoors. waterproofness is exceptional, spilled a cup of starbucks on it and it was unfazed hahaha. its a lil chunky- if ya got big hands its not a problem to carry around but it is hefty in weight. just wished it had 360 sound :(
customer_reviews.author: ramon d.

customer_reviews.title: The whole package!
customer_reviews.text: This portable speaker packs big sound in a small package. It offers truly great sound quality, easy/instant pairing to my iPhone, and a nice design aesthetic. I got this to replace a Bose SoundLink that was adorable (and smaller) but finicky when pairing with my phone. I’m very happy with this purchase for poolside tunes!
customer_reviews.author: CaboChica99

customer_reviews.title: Falls short.
customer_reviews.text: After hours of YouTube reviews, and a black friday cyber sale, I decided to go with this large awkward speaker with only decent battery life and ok sound quality. I know now for a fact that the bose is way better. The charge 4 distorts at about 3/4 of max volume and doesnt have the bass like that of smaller devices. Just because you add some flexy vibrating cones on the ends doesnt mean there will be better bass!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MrAaronT

customer_reviews.title: Charging port is its Achilles heal!
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker daily and as far as sound quality and volume this speaker is top of its class for the price. However, the deal breaker that got me only 6 months in, the charging port is trash. It has stopped being able to receive power through any charging cable on the market! I don’t care if Lamborghini lowered their prices to $50k a car, I still wouldn’t buy one if they said it will stop being able to be refueled after 6 months!
customer_reviews.author: Evan F.

customer_reviews.title: Superb (Super b)
customer_reviews.text: Impressive sound with awesome features. The front has a battery indicator (see white arrow on picture), there is a charging port behind the floppy door. You can adjust volume and turn/off from the top. Bluetooth capable. It will shut off automatically after non-use. It has superb sound with great clarity. Easy to bring along from room to room. Totally satisfied with battery life. Use this to get music and joy back into your life! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CTrujillo

customer_reviews.title: Connectivity works on Charge 4, not on Charge 3.
customer_reviews.text: The Charge 4 will connect with Boombox & other Charge 4s. Charge 3 will not connect to anything, so don't bother trying. I bought 2, 1 new & 1 renewed, neither connected. The connect button acting like the blue tooth button. JBL dropped ball on it & fixed it on Charge 4. UE Booms are best for connecting @ their $64 price. Sound quality is better than JBL, but JBL has better base response when you want to play speaker loud.
customer_reviews.author: Appfan

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED ! ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS SPEAKER!!! I took it to California and it is so easy and light to travel with! The sound quality is amazing!!! Not only that but the battery life is soo good! I didn’t charge it the whole trip and I used it for a few hours each day. I have never had any problems with it so far but I would highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: 10 Over 10
customer_reviews.text: This is my first speaker and I love it. I love the bass especially. I like to play my LoFi music at night when I’m doing homework and the sound quality makes the energy in the room feel so much more calm and relaxing. When I’m playing my regular jams on low, I can still hear the bass when I leave the room to go to the other side of the house and it sounds like there’s a party next door. Putting it in the bathtub while you shower makes the sound expand in a way so that makes for an exciting experience. This speaker is a 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Megan G.

customer_reviews.title: Super love it!
customer_reviews.text: I super love this JBL speaker, my uncle had bought a speaker (not this one) and it cost him $300 and it was bigger than this one supposedly it's one of the best brands and honestly? It's as loud as my uncle's and this was cheap. I use the speakers almost every day and it lasts almost like 2 days and a half sometimes three and it charges pretty fast. I don't regret buying this speaker, super love it!
customer_reviews.author: King.Juarez👑

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality awesome
customer_reviews.text: JBL sound quality is awesome. I recently purchase the Sony SRS XB33 but returned it because the sound quality did not beat out the JBL in my opinion. The JBL has a deeper tone with a lot better bass then the Sony SRS XB33 even with the Extra Bass option. The Sony does have better features but the sound quality was still missing for me. If you like deeper sound and better bass the JBL is your choice.
customer_reviews.author: TMC.CHA

customer_reviews.title: Needs more Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was louder, it may seem loud when in much quieter areas but i work at FedEx and wanted it for the warehouse to have music for the people near me working on the sorting belt. Unfortunately the fans seem to be much louder and the sound doesn’t reach people that are about 10ft away. I am considering buying the much bigger speaker but I’m not sure considering it is so bulky. A bit disappointed in JBL for its price point.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo94

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth speaker I’ve purchased!! Great job JBL
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Bluetooth speaker. Sound is excellent and can fill a room for such a small speaker. Has great bass and sound quality. I love the USB port to recharge your phone or iPod, since the battery life is great you can easily recharge your phone or iPod while playing music for several hours. For playing music only without using the recharge function I can go several days without having to recharge the speaker. great for camping or just a day outside. Absolutely recommend this product. Great job JBl!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Just like described. Very pleased. We also had an issue with not getting our first speaker I reached out to the company and they were so willing to work with us to get a replacement sent out asap. I would highly recommend this company and product without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Christine E. Scott

customer_reviews.title: An offset mono speaker?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe this is just personal preference but the single offset speaker is very distracting. If you hold it in front of you, you can immediately notice that there’s no sound coming from the left side. I initially thought maybe mine was defective as why would such an expensive device be mono. I did more research and learned it was designed that way. The sound quality is still excellent, I just personally can’t look past the unequal sound distribution.
customer_reviews.author: MasKans

customer_reviews.title: Monotone!
customer_reviews.text: Agree with what other reviewers said about the flat mono tone of iteration 4. Stick with the 3 version. I returned and went straight to the B*SE website and bucked up for the revolving sound. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: KLM

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Bass is weak. Volume is low. No way to adjust. This was $100 more than the OontZ Angle BT speaker that I got three years ago and it's NOT better... at all. Holding down the BT button with the + button simply causes the speaker to unpair and power down. These are not helpful. Don't waste your money on this if you're looking for anything other that very poor bass. AND it overheats like a snowflake in the sun. So if you want to take it to the beach, don't. Just don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Big sound, small package.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional musician and spend a lot of time listening to music with a critical ear. I didn't expect much from the JBL, but I was surprised at the sound quality pumped out by this compact unit. Connected to my phone effortlessly. Good bass tones and definition in the highs. Gets pretty loud, too. Highly recommend for when you want music away from your home base.
customer_reviews.author: Tom O

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Update: downgrading from 2 stars to 1. Jbl has terrible customer service at best. If you have questions, no one will help. This comes with usb cord only. Nothing to charge to wall outlet. If you want to hear a text message sound notification through your speaker, forget it. The original jbl charge does allow message sound notifications. You have to have your phone next to you constantly which totally defeats the purpose. It’s a step back. Will be returning this. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Loud battery life is great
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I love it it’s totally worth it Iv had this for a month I take it on bike rides it got wet multiple times still works keep it near the pool really loud it connects easily charges my phone fast and still holds a battery life
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Durable and excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and sound for small to medium size areas . I drive a truck and use it to listen to podcasts and music on my nightly run from Atlanta to Nashville and back . I also use it out in my wood shop , I like having the same sound quality in the places I spend the most of my time . It's super easy to pair up . Very durable , i just toss it in my backpack without any type of protection and it does just fine . Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: josh c

customer_reviews.title: Poor all around
customer_reviews.text: Very poor sound, little to zero bass, poor app support, and a miserablr battery life. If you are using this for outdoor or warehouse usage, it will disappoint. Full charge this morning granted 6.5 hours of play at 80% to 90% volume. Quite far beneath the 20 hours promised. If it had lasted 10 hours I might keep it, but the sound just isn't worth $180. Metal music sounds terrible and you have to put your ear up to the speaker to hear it at 100% volume. How does this garbage get passed off as premium stuff? Returning it immediately and taking the leap to Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Porter

customer_reviews.title: Battery won’t charge after some time. No support from amazon, seller or extended warranty provider
customer_reviews.text: In March 2019, I purchased this product trusting this seller and JBL would be reliable. I also purchased an extended warranty, to be on the safe side. One year later, March 2020, the battery stopped charging. I contacted Amazon, they told me that I should contact the seller. I did, and the seller (Firemall LLC) told me that I should solve this with Amazon. I contacted the provider for the extended warranty, and they will not cover the defective item. I'm very dissappointed and frustrated. Don't waste your money with this product and with extended warranty. At the end, no one will give you the support that you need.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Bass over sound
customer_reviews.text: This model is more so for bass. If you love bass... this speaker is perfect for you in every way. However, the quality of the actual sound could be improved. It’s exactly like the reviews on YouTube videos and the company videos explained. With all of that said, it’s worth the money and is loud. If you are in a middle school sized gym, and it’s playing on Apple Music, volume turned up completely, it’s heard. I’m just saying, it’s loud. Loud for house, outside activities, especially apartment. Bluetooth connects with no problem. Battery life last as promised for hours... with non stop playing.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker! I had a charge 3 which was great but gave it to my girlfriend to use in her Salon. This speaker excels in smaller spaces rooms. I mainly got it for traveling on cruises and going to the beach which it works great for. Battery seems to last a long time and I can charge my phone off of it in the airport or airplane. No regrets on this purchase and it sounds great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Kraus
